bow: am the only one who gets mad when people talk about having another baby and when we re gon na get pregnant again have 13 month old son and so far am perfectly fine with only having child have always wanted child and do really think my view will change and having everyone ask about the next one or making him little brother or sister just makes me so angry not everyone wants big family completely understand wanting multiple kids but it just not what want also just wanted to say good job to all the parents out there with big and small families my child is weeks old on monday have taken care of other children helped raise them this little one gives me run for my money there have already been others who ask if ready for another one or if going to give her sibling was told it unfair if keep her an only child still thinking holy hell how am going to take care of this one the newborn stage is going fast but it also seems to be lasting forever its hard to imagine her as toddler and damn if have another one while she is toddler damn feel your pain it annoying when people think they have any say in your personal life in our case we do want at least one more but when time and finances are right actually have one friend that like one is good do have anymore her comments are just as unwelcome as the relatives that are asking for sibling yeah get that too have little boy and regularly get few but surely you will want girl at some point well no raising kid not catching pokemons it annoying when people seem to think they know you better than you know yourself and go all smug and say oh you just wait you ll get broody again eventually well no sorry fell pregnant years ago now and still do want another kid anyway lot of people say those things without really thinking about it beforehand so try not to let it get to me in the end of the day it my choice and we re happy the way we are want to get dog though having child is massive responsibility no one has the right to make decision about to have kids than the parents and in particular the mother absolutely you re doing the right thing the course of action that is right for you am right there with you it took us three years and lot of fertility treatments to get our son then when he was five months old there was an incident at daycare and he had to have emergency brain surgery after this year the last thing want is another kid am still trying to make sure my ds has everything he needs so no you are the only one it makes mad people stopped asking us if we were going to try for boy after having girls around the time our youngest turned good times why on earth would we need boys woman work with was asking me when was going to have another baby and when told her have decided if ll have more she said but would you feel so bad if your daughter never had any siblings uh no no would love my sisters but there were many many times during my childhood that wished was an only child with my husband and both working full time one toddler is enough stress for us mentioned to another woman work with that gained 80 pounds during my pregnancy and she said should hurry up and have another one while still young because the weight will be harder to lose when older wtf logic is that share his blog post on your facebook feed maybe they ll get the message http www scarymommy com one and done feel like might be the only person who gets asked about more kids and the other person is just curious and has no intention of judging me are people elsewhere just incapable of having civil conversation about family size thankfully no one asked us even the very clucky grandma it such rude and personal question what if you just had miscarriage what if you were struggling with secondary infertility or if you only want one or large age gap this is pretty typical especially when you re in the thick of the newborn stage it all fuck no never again especially if you had ppd like did with my first that not to say that you will definitely or should have another but did even consider it until my daughter was for most people it when their first is around when they can talk and take care of themselves bit so it not so overwhelming tell people the factory is closed and that they are welcome to make their own lol happy with my two think people mean well but can understand why it would be annoying it seems to be one of those things people just mindlessly ask as part of small talk have had anyone ask me but my daughter is months old and know number of people who got pregnant with their second baby when their first was between and 12 months to be honest the thought of getting pregnant again right now is terrifying to me and say this as someone who intends to have children would like at least couple years in between my kids please and thank you so lucky to have stepson with him and my daughter we already have one of each joke my kid got all the benefits of having sibling without me having to pop out two my uterus is misshapen so mad is the emotion usually go with but yes my son was almost five before we decided to have another baby people will say anything to you do get offended most people asking these questions are just making conversation gt well no raising kid not catching pokemons this thank you my husband an knew when we were pregnant that this would be our only child he is almost 10 months old and am already sick of hearing about how we need little girl or how we will spoil him if we do have another my aunt has 10 children yes 10 and she brings it up everytime see or talk to her then gets terribly offended when say that is more than enough for us am from the south and at least around my part of it people do understand how to word things correctly they just spew whatever their views are and do care if it offends you or upsets you they do think ahead lol seriously like who says that very sorry to hear about that hope everything is well now also that nobody should ever say that one kid is all you need because only you know what you need think that the most annoying comment oh you do want him to be lonely only child do you why because it ll make him more independent because he will learn to not have to rely on another person all the time maybe do want to spread up my love between kids mean would definitely love how ever many kids had equally but would rather give all my time and attention to one and my money could have another child anyway if my finances stay the the way they have been yep have been very open with my family about my post partum depression and why feel one child is best for us they still ask when is coming or say so good with my nieces second one would be that hard very frustrating like said some people just do understand think before you speak no one needs child do believe could afford another either also worry too much now if even being decent parent know everyone has different way of doing things worry if holding her too much or not enough if letting her sleep too much do we do belly time enough could imagine trying to get one to learn everything and then all of sudden having another it is something he will have effects from his whole life fortunately we have lot of support from great doctors to get him the help he needs live just outside of the town with the highest birth rate in canada fort st john bc so most people around here have at least kids by the time they re in their mid 20s guess the weird one haha have three amp and people like to ask me if done they also like to tell me crazy it does really bother me except that it pretty much all people ever talk to me about like just baby machine with no other interests or hobbies but would be pissed if someone insinuated that my kids were going to be worse off because of the amount of siblings chose to provide them with my sister has one child he 13 and great kid you do what works for you it irritating but mellowing with age co worker once said to me you do want to have an only child they re spoiled and selfish am an only child am happy with my one child he all could ever want and often more than can handle it will bother you less over time lived in indianapolis for most of my adult life people do the same thing there so do think it strictly southern thing most people are asking and probably do really think about what they re asking just making conversation we waited almost years to have another always make sure say this is the last one after all that is always the next question we get this at every family function our daughter is 13 months old and seriously have no desire for another always thought want two or maybe three hah was insane but now feel like if have another taking away time could be spending with my girl my dad is trying to convince me that two is better because then they have each other but dunno my lo has cousins is that good enough oh was there in the beginning too am not saying you will change your mind but it is crazy what some time will do to dull the initial no you get in the beginning was so adament would never have another now sway between yes and and no people always assume siblings will be best friends this is not always the case cousins are awesome had ppd with my first and it was huge decision for us to try for second in some ways we re both still in shock that it happening ppd is battle to stay healthy and care for your family it totally understandable to not want to risk your mental health and ability to care for the child you already have but most people still do understand ppd pft want the pokemons kidding maybe thankfully no one does this to us think would deck them in the face although my husband getting fixed shortly after our first and only obviously was born sent out message to everyone haha once in while my sister jokes about me having babies but no one hassles us over it feel awful for the moms who get it constantly and are having trouble ttc swear people do use their brains thank you you re right most people do understand ppd think my family sees what went through as normal having newborn is hard struggles despite my diagnosis fortunately my husband and both feel secure in our decision to stop at one because we do feel it worth risking my life to have another so we just repeat no our family is complete now and try to let it roll off our backs take care of yourself best wishes for you and baby while understand that this might get super annoying just remember that it not worth your energy to get mad about it these people are probably well meaning and just looking for how the weather conversational tools when are you going to have another kid might feel pushy to you but until the last twenty years or so was totally normal question to ask in casual conversation especially with older or socially awkward people it might just be something to say take deep breath remind yourself that it does you absolutely no good to get irritated about it and that your family is just that yours then smile be gracious and offer an equally how the weather response yes that why would even ask if they were planning for another then they would initiate that conversation but do ask and hassle them because they might really want another one but be unable to get pregnant am very fortunate where my immediate family and best friends know better then to ask but customers at work and people at the mall are the worst right my lo babysitter is her aunt so she sees her cousin almost daily anyway have girl and would enjoy having boy just know that any time in the next years would be too soon props to people who can ve actually read about lot of people getting very mad about this the gap between my first two is years so heard that question lot ve had hysterectomy and ca have anymore after my second ve heard of people being extra sensitive when they struggle with infertility and think it totally understandable people still ask and it still does bother me think ve always just had the attitude that so long as people are coming from an extremely hateful place never care what topics of conversation they present to me if they bring up something do want to talk about can usually tell them do want to go into it change the subject or remove myself from the situation not going to let it ruin my mood my mil asked within the first two weeks and think just gave her look yeah it works both ways think when say ve got siblings people tell me wow your parents should have bought tv or something stupid like that it almost like people feel justified in saying something if you have more or less than children in the end of the day you know what works for your family and lot of people open their mouth and think afterwards catching pokemons ve got the baby rabies like crazy right now and now all can think of is catching shiny baby it would be redhead with curls got ta catch em all but yeah can see why that would be annoying crossing my fingers for you hope you catch your brand new dream baby soon =d it perfectly fine to not want any more kids just ignore or kindly avoid other people who seem pushy about the
